page.title: 10EDUCATION.
page.content: Children in Kirk Smeaton generally attend either Little Smeaton Primary School or Brayton High School under the auspices of the North Yorkshire Education Committee. Otherwise virtually all the children attend schools in Norton commencing with nursery provision at three through to sixth provision at eighteen. There is nursery provison for 60 children AT NORTON FIRST SCHOOL (Headmistress Mrs.M.Cant). They can start nursery education at 3+ and then normally transfer to the First School at 4+. At this level attendance is voluntary with compulsory education starting at 5. Most children spend four years here before transferring at 8+ to NORTON MIDDLE SCHOOL (Headmaster Mr.I.T.Wild) for the next stage of their education. There are 202 pupils on roll here.Both the First and Middle
